Class AggregateComponentResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • grading.ComponentResult
      • grading.AggregateComponentResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Markable, Weightable

    public class AggregateComponentResult
extends ComponentResult
    This entity class holds an ArrayList of subcomponentResult. An example of Aggregate Component: Coursework

    • Method Detail

      • getSubcomponentResult

        public ComponentResult getSubcomponentResult(java.lang.String targetName)
        This method gets the target subcomponent Result based on the target subcomponent name passed in as parameter. If a subcomponent's name matches the target name, the subcomponent is returned. Otherwise, if none of the subcomponents' names match, null is return.
        Parameters:
        targetName -
        Returns:
        subcomponent if it can be found, and null otherwise
